title: Elon Musk sets new daily Twitter limits for users
description: Elon Musk said verified accounts would be limited to reading 6,000 posts per day while unverified users will be limited to 600.

title: Goodreads was the future of book reviews. Then Amazon bought it.
description: A prominent author's decision to pull her novel from publication after being "review bombed" highlights Goodreads's power and raises questions about its owner: Amazon.

title: San Francisco may soon get 24/7 driverless cabs. City leaders are fuming.
description: San Franciscans may soon be able to hail a fully-autonomous robo-taxi. City officials aren't happy about that.
